description: The file defines the main application component for an Angular-based Tic Tac Toe game, including imports, dependency injections, component metadata, state management, event handlers for game actions, and placeholders for future features like single-player mode and role-based access control.

classes.name: AppComponent
classes.description: Main Angular component for the Tic Tac Toe application's frontend, managing UI interactions, game state interfacing, and placeholders for features like AI mode and role-based access.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the component, injects services, and sets up effects for reacting to state changes.

methods.name: onCellClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on game board cells, triggering the game logic to process a move.

methods.name: onRestart
methods.description: Resets the game state and logs the restart action for audit purposes.

methods.name: toggleSinglePlayer
methods.description: Toggles the single-player AI mode; currently a placeholder for future integration.

methods.name: getAuditTrail
methods.description: Fetches current audit log entries for display or analysis.
